title: 著作出版
content: 序号 论文名称 第一作者 通讯作者 发表年月 发表刊物名称 1 Machine learning models for orthokeratology lens fitting and axial length prediction Shuai Xu ， Xiaoyan Yang Lihua Li 2023 年 8 月 Ophthalmic Physiol Opt 2 Evaluation of the corneal topography based on deep learning Shuai Xu#, Xiaoyan Yang# Hanyu Zhang, Lihua Li, Qing Ye 2024 年 1 月 Front Med (Lausanne) 3 Assessment of dynamic corneal response parameters in Chinese patients of different ages with myopia and orthokeratology lenses using the Corvis ST Shuxian Zhang Xuan Li 2024 年 4 月 Cont Lens Anterior Eye 4 The Impact of Back Optic Zone Design in Orthokeratology on Visual Performance Xiaoqin Chen Maria Liu, Yan Wang 2024 年 5 月 Randomized Controlled Trial 5 One-year efficacy of myopia control by the defocus distributed multipoint lens: a multicentric randomised controlled trial Xiaoqin Chen Lihua Li ， Yan Wang 2024 年 10 月 Randomized Controlled Trial 6 Macrophage membrane ‒ biomimetic nanoparticles target inflammatory microenvironment for epilepsy treatment Chao Geng Wenyou Li, Yuhao Li, Guoguang Zhao 2024 年 10 月 Theranostics 7 Slowing myopia progression with cylindrical annular refractive elements (CARE) spectacle lenses-Year 1 results from a 2-year prospective, multi-centre trial Xiaoqin Chen Lihua Li 2024 年 11 月 Acta Ophthalmol 8 The Xaliproden Nanoscale Zirconium-Porphyrin Metal-Organic Framework (XAL-NPMOF) Promotes Photoreceptor Regeneration Following Oxidative and Inflammatory Insults Yajie Wang#, Bo Yuan#, Wei Liu# Yuhao Li, Xiaoyong Yuan 2024 年 10 月 Int J Nanomedicine
